official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to establish requirements for the issuance of credit cards to dependent students between 18 and 21 years of age to prohibit the issuance of credit cards to dependents under 18 years of age.

summary.text: Student Credit Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to set limits upon credit cards issued to any individual that is a dependent student. Proscribes the issuance of credit cards to dependents under 18 years of age.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to establish requirements for the issuance of credit cards to dependent students between 18 and 21 years of age to prohibit the issuance of credit cards to dependents under 18 years of age.
